original_text: But even at that time, many of the Jewish leaders did believe in Jesus. But they were afraid of the Pharisees. So they did not tell people that they believed. They were afraid that the Pharisees would send them away from their meeting places.
korean_text: 그러나 관리 중에도 그를 믿는 자가 많되 바리새인들 때문에 드러나게 말하지 못하니 이는 출교를 당할까 두려워함이라

sentences.original_text: many of the Jewish leaders did believe in Jesus
But they were afraid of the Pharisees
So they did not tell people that they believed
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 자신들이 믿는다고 사람들에게 말하지 않았더라

sentences.original_text: They were afraid that the Pharisees would send them away
